name: eye
content:
eye noun [C]
(BODY PART)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 one of the two organs in your face that are used for seeing: He has no sight in his left eye. She's got beautiful green eyes. He closed his eyes and went to sleep.
PeopleImages/DigitalVision/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a nasty cut above the eye.You'll poke someone in the eye with that umbrella if you're not careful!She's got fair hair and blue eyes.When she looked at him, her eyes were full of tears.The officer looked at him narrowly through half-closed eyes.
